p: The antidiabetic potential of P. linearis extracts and EO was determined upon inhibition of the α-amylase enzyme that is involved in hydrocarbon’s metabolism. The iodine/potassium iodide (I/KI) method was used [27]. The concentration of samples was prepared with MeOH at 10 mg/mL, and the enzyme was prepared with 0.8 U/mL in 20 mM in sodium phosphate buffer pH (6.9). The control wells contained all the reagents without the sample (the solvents of the samples instead were added).
